name: Potato Carrot in Coconut Oil
description: This Potato Carrot in Coconut Oil recipe is a perfect representation of low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar eating that doesn't compromise on taste. Ideal for anyone looking to enjoy healthy yet delicious meals, it's a testament to how simple ingredients can create a nutritious dish that's both satisfying and health-conscious.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the baby potatoes thoroughly and peel the carrots.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the carrots into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the extra virgin coconut oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the baby potatoes to the pan and cook for 10 minutes until they start to become tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced carrots to the pan with the potatoes and cook for an additional 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until both are fully cooked and slightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
